) } } export default product const Container = styled.div` ` const Wrapper = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: ; ` const ProductImg = styled.div` margin-left: 150px ` const Image_ = styled.img` height: 100vh; display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; border: 0.5px ; ` const ProductInfo = styled.div` ` const ProductBrand = styled.h2` ` const ProductName = styled.p` ` const Attributes = styled.div` ` const AttributeType = styled.div` ` const AttributeItems = styled.div` ` const Price = styled.h3` `
